ivardefs.name: approvalDate
ivardefs.desc: The date on which the resource content was approved by the publisher. Approval happens once when the content is officially approved for usage.

ivardefs.name: clinicalRecommendationStatement
ivardefs.desc: Provides a summary of relevant clinical guidelines or other clinical recommendations supporting the measure.

ivardefs.name: compositeScoring
ivardefs.desc: If this is a composite measure, the scoring method used to combine the component measures to determine the composite score.

ivardefs.name: contact_
ivardefs.desc: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

ivardefs.name: contributor_
ivardefs.desc: A contributor to the content of the measure, including authors, editors, reviewers, and endorsers.

ivardefs.name: copyright
ivardefs.desc: A copyright statement relating to the measure and/or its contents. Copyright statements are generally legal restrictions on the use and publishing of the measure.

ivardefs.name: date
ivardefs.desc: The date  (and optionally time) when the measure was published. The date must change if and when the business version changes and it must change if the status code changes. In addition, it should change when the substantive content of the measure changes.

ivardefs.name: definition_
ivardefs.desc: Provides a description of an individual term used within the measure.

ivardefs.name: description
ivardefs.desc: A free text natural language description of the measure from a consumer's perspective.

ivardefs.name: disclaimer
ivardefs.desc: Notices and disclaimers regarding the use of the measure, or related to intellectual property (such as code systems) referenced by the measure.

ivardefs.name: effectivePeriod
ivardefs.desc: The period during which the measure content was or is planned to be in active use.

ivardefs.name: experimental
ivardefs.desc: A boolean value to indicate that this measure is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing), and is not intended to be used for genuine usage.

ivardefs.name: group_
ivardefs.desc: A group of population criteria for the measure.

ivardefs.name: guidance
ivardefs.desc: Additional guidance for the measure including how it can be used in a clinical context, and the intent of the measure.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: A formal identifier that is used to identify this measure when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

ivardefs.name: improvementNotation
ivardefs.desc: Information on whether an increase or decrease in score is the preferred result (e.g., a higher score indicates better quality OR a lower score indicates better quality OR quality is whthin a range).

ivardefs.name: jurisdiction_
ivardefs.desc: A legal or geographic region in which the measure is intended to be used.

ivardefs.name: lastReviewDate
ivardefs.desc: The date on which the resource content was last reviewed. Review happens periodically after approval, but doesn't change the original approval date.

ivardefs.name: library_
ivardefs.desc: A reference to a Library resource containing the formal logic used by the measure.

ivardefs.name: name
ivardefs.desc: A natural language name identifying the measure. This name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generation.

ivardefs.name: publisher
ivardefs.desc: The name of the individual or organization that published the measure.

ivardefs.name: purpose
ivardefs.desc: Explaination of why this measure is needed and why it has been designed as it has.

ivardefs.name: rateAggregation
ivardefs.desc: Describes how to combine the information calculated, based on logic in each of several populations, into one summarized result.

ivardefs.name: rationale
ivardefs.desc: Provides a succint statement of the need for the measure. Usually includes statements pertaining to importance criterion: impact, gap in care, and evidence.

ivardefs.name: relatedArtifact_
ivardefs.desc: Related artifacts such as additional documentation, justification, or bibliographic references.

ivardefs.name: riskAdjustment
ivardefs.desc: A description of the risk adjustment factors that may impact the resulting score for the measure and how they may be accounted for when computing and reporting measure results.

ivardefs.name: scoring
ivardefs.desc: Indicates how the calculation is performed for the measure, including proportion, ratio, continuous variable, and cohort. The value set is extensible, allowing additional measure scoring types to be represented.

ivardefs.name: set
ivardefs.desc: The measure set, e.g. Preventive Care and Screening.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The status of this measure. Enables tracking the life-cycle of the content.

ivardefs.name: supplementalData_
ivardefs.desc: The supplemental data criteria for the measure report, specified as either the name of a valid CQL expression within a referenced library, or a valid FHIR Resource Path.

ivardefs.name: title
ivardefs.desc: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the measure.

ivardefs.name: topic_
ivardefs.desc: Descriptive topics related to the content of the measure. Topics provide a high-level categorization of the type of the measure that can be useful for filtering and searching.

ivardefs.name: type_
ivardefs.desc: Indicates whether the measure is used to examine a process, an outcome over time, a patient-reported outcome, or a structure measure such as utilization.

ivardefs.name: url
ivardefs.desc: An absolute URI that is used to identify this measure when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance. This SHALL be a URL, SHOULD be globally unique, and SHOULD be an address at which this measure is (or will be) published. The URL

ivardefs.name: usage
ivardefs.desc: A detailed description of how the measure is used from a clinical perspective.

ivardefs.name: useContext_
ivardefs.desc: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These terms may be used to assist with indexing and searching for appropriate measure instances.

ivardefs.name: version
ivardefs.desc: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the measure when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the measure author and is not expected to be globally unique. For example, it mi
